event-group.description: Activate / deactivate this group as needed.
event-group.title: Debug

action.name: Set text
action.param: "timer: " & timer & newline & "numCorrect: " & numCorrect & newline & imageTop.ImagePointCount & " | " & imageLeft.ImagePointCount & newline & "wrong: " & Wrong.Count & newline & "currentLevel: " & currentLevel & newline & "anim: " & imageTop.AnimationName

sub-events.comment: The images of each level are frames of the sprite's animations.
We'll need something for what happens when the player beats all of the levels.
Spawn locations where there are differences
The locations of the differences are specified by setting image points.
The portrait layout uses the image points of the imageTop object.
The landscape layout uses the image points of the imageLeft object.
Create a copy on the other side

events.comment: Note for future: check if it's possible to have 'victory' and 'game over' at the same time

sub-events.comment: Disable / enable lose conditions as needed.
